body.name: LED Desk Lamp with Clamp for Home Office, 24W Ultra Bright 7 Stepless Dimming/5 Color Modes/Timer, Architect Modern Table Lamp with Touch and Remote Control USB Charging Port for Study Reading
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 18 hrs 59 mins
features: 24W SUPER BRIGHT DESK LAMP WITH CLAMP - This 24W LED desk lamp is designed with dual lamp heads, the light bar can be extended up to 31.5 inches, the height can be up to 31 inches, and the angle is adjustable, illuminating your entire desk. Desk lamp with clamp is suitable for multi-monitor workstations, home offices, large desks, study rooms, architects, computers, drawing, sewing, crafts, painting, reading, games, and piano.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LIGHT MODES - The office desk lamp provides a wide range of brightness adjustments, including 7 brightness stepless dimming and 5 color temperature modes (2800K-6000K). It also has two special functions (memory and timing function). The memory function can keep the table lamp in the last used mode and brightness without resetting. The timer function can make the desk lamp turn off automatically after working for 1 hour to prevent us from being overworked.

ENERGY SAVING EYE PROTECTION & USB CHARGING PORT - This LED desk light illuminates uniformly, softly, flicker-free, glare-free, blue light-free, and accurate in color, which helps relieve eye fatigue caused by long-time viewing of computer screens, thereby protecting our eyes; The desk lamp with a USB charging port allows you to charge your devices without a wall plug.

2 WAYS CONTROL - The modern desk lamp has a sensitive touch function and is equipped with a wireless remote control, you can easily control the LED desk lamp through the wireless remote control and choose the lighting mode that suits you best (stepless dimming/color temperature/timing)

EASY TO INSTALL & DURABLE - The LED lamp installation process is simple and easy, no need additional tools required. The LED desk lamps with metal compact base clamps fit easily in any space. The task desk lamp is made of aluminum alloy and ABS material, which is durable and sturdy, long service life. We provide 365 days warranty, and the service team is online 7*24. Any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rotatable desk lamp protects the eyes of people who work and read for long periods from harm. No glare, No flicker, No ultraviolet ray, No frequency radiation. Ultra bright light bar design for freely adjustment. The lighting coverage up to 71”. Perfect for large desktop with multiple monitors.

Previous page 24W LIGHT BAR 24W LED desk lamp light bar can illuminate your entire desk. Suitable for drawing, reading, game etc 31.5" / 71" FULL DESKTOP COVERAGE For large desktop, dual-screen monitor, preferred by designers, architects, students, office workers REJECTING FATIGUE illuminates uniformly, softly, flicker-free, glare-free, blue light-free, and accurate in color EASY INSTALLATION Metal clamps fit a wide range of desktops and are easy to install in 5 minutes Next page 1 ULTRA-BRIGHT 2 WIDE COVERAGE 3 MULTIPLE LIGHTING MODES 4 EYE PROTECTION 5 EASY TO USE

FREE ANGLE Adjust the angle of the light bar freely to change the direction of the light and get a wider and bigger illumination range. CONTROL METHOD It has a touch screen and wireless remote control two ways to control, more convenient to use, more quickly USB DESIGN An extra USB charging port is conveniently designed so that you can charge your other devices directly while working. HIGH VERSATILITY Flexible and adjustable metal clamp design supports up to 2.8 inches of desktop thickness.
LED Power 24W CCT 2800K/3500K/4200K/5000K/6000K Lifespan 35000H CRI ≥95 Luminance ≥1000LUX Material ABS+ Aluminum Product size 800*78*890mm=31.5*3*35inch N.W. 1230g=2.7lb

How to pair the desk lamp remote control? When the power is turned on and no lights, press and hold the switch button on the lamp head for 5 seconds, and then you will see the power button flashing. At this time, you only need to press the remote control to complete the pairing. Does this desk lamp use batteries or an adapter？ Powered by an adapter. What is the after-sales service on this lamp? We are a professional lamp manufacturer and will take care of everything for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to office space
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lamp. I recently upgraded to larger monitors which means that I don't have as much space on my desk for lighting. I spend a lot of time on virtual meetings and my office has limited natural lighting and there's no good way to position the desk to ensure enough light during all the hours of the workday. Therefore, my desktop lamp was a necessity. Now that I don't have the space anymore, I needed a different solution and this lamp really fit the bill. Installation was a breeze and as I was putting it together I noticed how sturdy the whole thing was. It's made of high grade heavy duty metal, so there is no concern at whether it will last. The aesthetics of this lamp are excellent... Nice and sleek - much better than my previous standard table lamp. Best of all, it's very wide, so it covers a large area and provides even light.One of my favorite things about this lamp is the remote control. Many times throughout the day as I'm working, I keep the light off because I don't need a task light, however, if I get a video call then the lighting will be too low for the camera. The camera so I need to be able to turn the light on and off several times throughout the day. The remote makes this possible without having to reach way up to the power button on top of the lamp. The remote control is not your typical remote, and in the best way possible. It's a little cylindrical object the size of a hockey puck and you can adjust the brightness by turning it left or right. You can turn the whole thing on and off simply by pressing the top. This is great because you don't have to look for a button on a specific location on the remote, because the whole thing acts as the on and off button. Another wonderful addition on the device is the fact that it has a USB charging port on the base of the stem. I never knew I needed this lamp and it's corresponding remote but now that I have them I would not give them up. Obviously I would very much recommend this lamp, especially at this price point.There are a couple of things that I would change about this lamp. If I could. The first would be that I would allow it to be mounted or attached to a surface in multiple ways. The way it is now it has to be able to be mounted the way you would mount anything with a c clamp. I would also make it so that the angle of the light itself could be adjusted. I would imagine that some people would need lighting directly to their face, while others might just want to illuminate the items on their desk more. This lamp does have a very happy medium between those two needs. However, you will not be able to make any adjustments. Finally, I would want to make this lamp height adjustable. To be clear, it is possible to adjust the height by changing the angle of the arms on the back, but in my case I have very large monitors, and on top of that they are attached to a monitor stand which I have adjusted to a particular height that makes them ergonomic. Because of this, I have very little to work with as far as making any more adjustments to the height or angle. I have pretty much maxed out the length of the arm.Again, I am very happy with the placement and think that this lamp makes a wonderful addition to my office. Despite the things I would change, I still think it's a superior product to the other ones that are available and would recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my home office!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great desk lamp with all the right features for my setup. I work from home full time and needed to add some light above my workspace. This light fit in perfectly behind my 6 monitor setup. With the included remote I am able to control everything very easily without having to reach up and use the controls on the lamp. I like being able to easily adjust the brightness throughout the day, and change the color temperature, all via the included remote. Install was quick and simple. Also very secure once mounted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lamp is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: This lamp can be bright or dim and easy on the eyes, with multiple styles of hue. I didn’t even notice the remote that comes with this, that makes this lamp even cooler! The lamp is across the other side of the room and I keep the remote right by the door, can turn it on as soon as I walk in the room. Which is nice cause this room does not have a light on a light switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this bright it is. I use it to take pictures for my jewelry shop on Etsy. The brightness is completely adjustable so I can change the brightness to best fit the shot. The frame is wide and brightens up my entire table.I saw that some mentioned that it was hard to put together. I agree that it was a little hard to toggle with (due to the weight). It comes with a remote with batteries, instructions, and everything you need to put it together. The screwdriver has a magnetic tip which helps keep the screw in place. (Good quality screwdriver, definitely saving it for future projects!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice light but poor instructions
reviews.reviewText: This unit gives off adequate light. The remote works well. I wish the light extended outward more so it would light more of my keyboard. The instructions have some errors:1. It states that the wireless remote needs to be paired. It states to hold the power button until the power light flashes. It never did. Then I realized the remote was already paired from the factory.2. It states to remove a screw before attaching the led light bar to the stand but there is no screw. The bar just snaps into place.3. You almost need a magnifying glass to read the instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functionality, and Control
reviews.reviewText: This lamp rocks my workspace! Sturdy build, sleek design, and wide coverage make it a winner. The remote control is a game-changer for easy adjustments, and the USB port is a bonus. Despite minor wishes for more mounting options and adjustable angles, it's a superior product at a great price. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s so strong and bright, it lights up my entire desk area. It’s easy to put together and operate. I love the remote, even though I forget to use it. LOL
